name: updateAlarm

metadata.description:
updateAlarm


Update status and/or severity of an alarm.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed
Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • alarmId: id of the alarm to update (UUID)
  • status (optional): ACTIVE or ACKNOWLEDGED
  • severity (optional): WARNING, MINOR, MAJOR or CRITICAL
